translations: 感知力强的，有洞察力的，思维敏捷的；视觉的，听觉的，感觉的

sentences.sentence: His comment was trenchant and perceptive.
sentences.translation: 他的评论犀利且具洞察力。

sentences.sentence: It was very perceptive of you to notice that.
sentences.translation: 你能注意到此事，真够敏锐的。

sentences.sentence: He was one of the most perceptive U.S. political commentators.
sentences.translation: 他曾是美国最具洞察力的政治评论员之一。
